com.mapdigit.gis

Class MapText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.MapObject
      • com.mapdigit.gis.MapText

  • public final class MapText
extends MapObject
    Class MapText stands for a text map object.

    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
